arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Paris squad: A player injrued, another comes back
arts.sum: This Saturday (kick-off at 5 p.m., CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Nice (8th) at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Here is the squad selected by PSG coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hakimi, Hernandez, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho, Zabarnyi. Midfielders – Lee, […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain will welcome OGC Nice to the Parc des Princes on Saturday for a Ligue 1 showdown. PSG vs Nice – Predicted lineup and team news PSG Team News The hosts will be without Désiré Doué, who sustained a right thigh injury during their recent draw against Lorient. The young forward, just 20, had […] The post PSG vs Nice – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Franck Haise gives the keys to the match and applauds Paris

arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – The Niçois squad: several players missing
arts.sum: This Saturday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) and Nice (8th) will face off at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season (kick-off at 5 pm, CET). Here is the squad selected by Nice coach Franck Haise for this match. Unavailable – Adbelmonem, Bombito, Cho, Clauss, Dante, Moffi, Ndayishimiye (injury).
